alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 3:11PM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Allegan and Van Buren counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While the heavy lake effect snow band is weakening, there is still heavy snow falling near the lake shore. This snow band will not really weaken enough to end this event until just after sunset. So, expect heavy snow to continue near the lake shore from just north of South Haven to near Covert until then. Storm total snowfall may exceed 2 feet in many parts of this area by evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
